rules.build: cd $XPACK_BUILD_DIR make cat > ca-certificates.conf <<EOF # This file lists certificates that you wish to use or to ignore to be # installed in /etc/ssl/certs. The update-ca-certificates command will # update /etc/ssl/certs by reading this file. # # line beginning with # is a comment. # line beginning with ! is a certificate filename to be deselected. # EOF find ./ -type f -a '(' -name '*.crt' -o -name '*.pem' ')' -print | \ while read CERT do echo $CERT | sed "s@^./@@" done | \ sort -u >> ca-certificates.conf
rules.install: cd $XPACK_BUILD_DIR install -m 0755 -d $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/sbin install -m 0755 -d $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/share/ca-certificates make DESTDIR=$XPACK_INSTALL_DIR install install -m 0755 -d $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/etc install -m 0644 ca-certificates.conf $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/etc/
